snippet.title: The Feathered Serpent - Game Trailer
snippet.description:
The Feathered Serpent is a 2d action-platformer that combines the fast-paced combat of a shooter game with randomly generated levels, enemies, and items! It has heavy Roguelite elements, with a progression system of sacrificing bloodgems to different gods for permanent upgrades. As you follow our protagonist on his journey, players will find many treasures and weapons that change how he attacks and combine together in unique combinations!

Help support me, this channel, and the game by donating below!
https://www.patreon.com/Tsundown
Follow me on any of my socials for The Feathered Serpent videos and updates!
Twitter: https://twitter.com/TsundownStudios
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@thefeatheredserpentgame?lang=en
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thefeatheredserpentgame/
Please consider supporting me by sharing my videos with others, and by giving me feedback on the game demo which can be found here https://tsundown.itch.io/the-feathered-serpent
Join the discord for Updates!
https://discord.gg/DepuVrSb
If you want to here more ramblings or just watch me play fun indie games go check out my gaming channel here
https://www.youtube.com/@tsundowngaming
